profile.name: Tiash Mazumder
profile.headline: Full-Stack Data Analyst Portfolio
profile.summary: I’m an aspiring Full-Stack Data Analyst with a Master’s degree in Applied Information Technology from Victoria University, Sydney. I build dashboards and turn business data into insights using Excel, SQL, Python, and Power BI. I’m currently strengthening my SQL skills through real-world projects.

excel.title: Sales Performance & Profitability Dashboard
excel.subtitle: Excel • KPI • Profitability • Business Insights
excel.description: An end-to-end Excel dashboard analyzing sales performance, profitability, KPIs, and trends across products and regions.
highlights: Built KPI dashboard for revenue, profit, and margin using PivotTables & PivotCharts
Analyzed product- and region-level performance to identify profit drivers
Designed a business-ready dashboard layout for decision-making

sql.title: SQL Project (In Progress)
sql.subtitle: SQL • Joins • CTEs • Aggregations
sql.description: Currently building an SQL analysis project to strengthen query skills and business reporting.

skills.name: Excel
skills.text: PivotTables, PivotCharts, KPI dashboards, business reporting.

skills.name: SQL
skills.text: Joins, CTEs, aggregations, window functions (actively developing).

skills.name: Power BI
skills.text: Interactive reports, slicers, DAX basics, storytelling.
